Package Commands

Interface Summary
Command Interface for all the commands passed from server to the agent
 

Class Summary
AddToCrlCommand Adding the certificate into revocation list.
ChangeConfCommand Changing the configuration of the agent run
CommandFactory Generates command object according the defined command name
DelCertCommand Removes the certificate from the keystore according serial number
GenrateKeyPairCommand Generates key public-private pair and creates a certificate.
GenrateSecertCommand Generates secret key using algorithm specified in the Message Encodes the certificate into Base64.
InstallCertCommand Adds a certificate as trusted.
InstallSecertCommand Stores a passed secret key.
newInstanceCommand Creates a new instance of implementor.
StopMainLoopCommand Stops the main loop from getting and committing a tasks.
